creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison

signed: LLC below image, in black: [Taxco, Mexico]; LRC below image, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]; left margin, printed in black: [一九七五年作  メキシコのタスコ] {1975nen saku, ?????}
title: Taxco, Mexico
